Blog.post: I always feel like everything is passing me by. I miss the world even when i'm part of it. well............ i don't know, maybe i'm just unsure of what the world really is. Rhedyn "Nevermore"
I'm watching my new Manson dvd.well actually i'm watching Twiggy trample up and down the stage in his little dress. TWIGGY I LOVE YOU Rhedyn "Nevermore"
I'm so tired these days. The end of term is horrible. No one can think right, so naturally this is the time teachers set assessments. Rhedyn "Nevermore"

I felt really bad today. i snapped at my friends Jennyj and Erin because they laughed at me when i made a mistake in science. all lunch i just wanted to be alone, which is hard when you sit in a room full of noisey teens. everyone left me alone. good for me Rhedyn "Nevermore"

I had the most amazing dreams last night. peaceful and calm, the sort dreams i haven't had since i was a little kid. Taeghan, I can't thank you enough, you are even helping me with my dreams. Rhedyn "Nevermore"
I have done practally nothing today. i got up at 1pm and played playstation, thats it. i really need a life. "I do what i want. you got problem?" Rhedyn "Nevermore"

I feel so sickly today. last night I threw up sweveral times, but i had to go to school today because i have an English assignment starting today so i went to school only to find that my teacher had desided not to start it today!!! "This rage I cannot let go" Rhedyn "Nevermore"
I feel horrible today. just like i'm about to throw up but my automatic defence system won't allow it. Rhedyn "Nevermore"

I'm listening to the most horrorshow mix CD anyone has given me. It was made by my friend Jonathan, and it has all my favourite songs on it (even ones i didn't even know, he knew I liked) "I've got an F and a C and i've got a K too" Rhedyn "Nevermore"
It seems i'm going to my school ball next year! I don't really want to but it WILL be my last year. I got cornered into it my my "friends" JenniJ and Erin Rhedyn "Nevermore"

Mmmmmmmm an hour of meditation and 20 pages of 'The Picture of Dorian Grey'. I'm feeling really relaxed and calm. Too bad it won't last, i wish i could feel this way forever. "I'm nothing from nowhere, I'm no one at all." Rhedyn "Nevermore"
I've had problems breathing all day. stupid back. i think it will take me several hours to uncink it. "Rose McGowan is an albino whore" Rhedyn "Nevermore"
I am reading about 5 different online comics at the moment, one of the funniest is White Ninja - http://www.whiteninjacomics.com/ Rhedyn "Nevermore"
I just watched my Placebo DVD for the millionth time. Brian Molko is a genius of music, not bad looking either. "Sick and tired of Maggie's farm" Rhedyn "Nevermore"

I was just on the IRD website so i can get my tax rebate. it is so unorganised, it took me half an hour to find a document that should be available from the front page!!!! they really need to get their act together. "you're not a real unicorn, you're just an ordinary horse." Rhedyn "Nevermore"

Okay after that rant i'm feeling much better. Horray it is the end of 'Sexual Harassment week'. I just remembered about the blue moon coming up this year, i can't wait. unfortunately it is on a Monday so i can't celebrate it with my pagan friends :( Oh well maybe next time. oh that reminds me, there is this great pagan Comic strip online that everyone should read and vote for : Oh my Gods - ohmygods.timerift.net Rhedyn "Nevermore"

I have this.......................aquaintance and he stole my idea (talking about the best person EVER, and he isn't even agreeing with me about Twiggy being best) ARRRRRRRRG. His name is Campbell, i mean what kind of name is that anyway and he has the worst taste in SOME music, he likes listening to an artist I really really hate, which wouldn't be so bad if he didn't remark about......it... all the time. huh steal my idea will he! and he's pathetic AH,he just trashed me on his Blog. He can't even think of his own jokes, he just leaches off everyone else. Rhedyn "Nevermore"

I nearly went a whole day without talking about my favourite person in the entire world :Twiggy/Jeordie White Bass guitar player for Marilyn Manson/A Perfect Circle. Best person EVER Rhedyn "Nevermore"

I'm a bit of a conpulsive reader. I feel wrong if i don't have a book to read. So what are the best books in the world? hmmm lets see Anne Rice Terry Pratchett...... Ok i really think that is it! Rhedyn
I never take the obvious step. so here's a quote "Real children don't go hopity skip unless their on drugs"

(thoughtless) "Thumbing through the pages of my fantasies Pushing all the mercy down, down, down I wanna see you try to take a swing at me Come on, gonna put you on the ground, ground, ground Why are you trying to make fun of me? You think it's funny? What the fuck you think it's doing to me? You take your turn lashing out at me I want you crying with your dirty ass in front of me All of my hate cannot be found I will not be drowned by your thoughtless scheming So you can try to tear me down Beat me to the ground I will see you screaming" Rhedyn "Nevermore"

I'm in computing right now and there is this real dick playing a really old song about bilbo baggins, he doesn't even realise why it's so funny.... it is sung by the actor who played spock (you know, from star trek). he's just lauing because it sounds funny, twit. why must people like that be around me Rhedyn "Nevermore"

Today i had to go to the Sal army b-day celebrations with the rest of the synphonic band and the gospal choir, the thing is, it was in a church AND the gospal choir's every second word was 'jesus' or 'god' or 'lord' being the bad little pagan that i am, i hated this dearly...... never again, NEVER Rhedyn "Nevermore"

Placebo is releasing an album of their singles!!! I must have it!!! i can't wait until it gets here which i'm sure will be a lifetime away. This is the best news that i've heard in some while, i can always count on placebo to bring me up when i'm down. Rhedyn "Nevermore"

I really dislike the new school computer software. itunes isn't working with any of my CD's and the internet won't let you into hotmail. it's just being really really annoying. I want to cheak my e-mails :( to see if anyone 'wuvs' me (Josiah's word not mine! Rhedyn "Nevermore"

I'm in a rather poetic mood, but really i know no other. A mood where beauty is throughout my little world, in the darkness of every corner, everywhere a spider creates it's home, wonder so overwhelming tears could rise. I know better, not to show a weakness amongst this world, with it's judging ways, and it's fingers pointing directly at me. Eventually their eyes will wonder and their laughing will become no more than a horse grumble, this is the time where i will be safe in my own skin, when they choose another to judge so harshly for every mistake like they did to me. Then bliss will come, when my soul becomes so light that it chooses to drift among to clouds but it is not my place and i will soon be dragged down again where all the eyes watch me anew and the laughing is stronger than ever. Rhedyn "Nevermore"

One thing I really hate about the holidays is that you get caught in the most annoying type of talk possible. the type of conversations where it goes somthing like this. "Hi, how are you, oh thats good, wow isn't the weather lovely today" I can't stand it. I need to have a meaningful conversation. I makes me want to smash my head againt a brick wall. Oh of all the worlds i am stuck to reality in this nightmare of a place. To stop myself from actually smashing my head into a brick wall i've had to meditate more meaning that i'm sort of floating on air right now. Rhedyn "Nevermore"

I have just worked through all my music files, renaming them and copying the new ones for my new media player.......... yay. this work doesn't sound like much but i spent over 2 hours doing it!!! Rhedyn "Nevermore"

I went and got my hair cut today, just a cm or 2 off the bottom. And the hair dresser was talking to my mum about how much i looked like her (yeah right, it took her about 10 mins to realise that we were related let alone that she was my mum) and then the hairdresser said "blah blah blah ....and she has such beautiful eyes" scary as hell. she could have talked about my hair but no, goes straight for the eyes. Rhedyn "Nevermore"

I have a picture of Lauri Yl√∂nen (singer of 'the Rasmus') as my display picture and my friend Jonathan keeps laughing at the Feathers in his hair, why? no idea. i like his feathers Rhedyn "Nevermore"

I adore sleeping. when i wake up i can hardly wait until i can go back to sleep. it's a special place where i don't hear my parents chatting about sport, my brother telling stupid jokes that no one but him gets and where i can't hear my dad doing some random unneeded handy work. Rhedyn "Nevermore"

Last night i went to a horrorshow movie night with Jenny J at Paco's. we watched: Ghost world...... Meh The Craft.......offensive The ring.......interesting There was one other movie but we were pretty tired and went to sleep instead of watching it. Overly a funny night. Me and JennyJ wouldn't play nice and we kept kicking eachother, ok ok i kept kicking her but she kicked back. Taeghan had to ask us to play nice,i don't do 'NICE' but i waited until morning before hassling her again. Rhedyn "Nevermore"

I just watched this monty python like movie called yellowbeard. my whole family have always been obsessed with it and this was my first time seeing it. i really can't see what was so great, a few alright one liners and a bad plot line. Rhedyn "Nevermore"

It's my brother's birthday tomorrow but we really don't connect very well so i havn't gotten him anything. he only gets me things on my birthday (books) so he can borrow them (and they are not even the books that i want) Rhedyn "Nevermore"
I went to the library today, looked at every fiction book and only found 2 suitable books. chartwell library sucks Rhedyn "Nevermore"

It's official, my life without a good book to read is even worse than usual. I've been so bored today and i couldn't go to the library because it closes early on a sunday. I'm going tomorrow, i can't stand this torcher anymore. Rhedyn "Nevermore"

I get bored all the time, i need some mental stimulation, and the closest thing to that i have in my house is my parents ranting about rugby.............. no thanx i think i'll stay bored Rhedyn "Nevermore"
i can't wait to be let go from these halls of boredom. last class, computing. which is actually alright since we never do any actual work Rhedyn "Nevermore"
Ah nothing to do. I'm actually considering doing some work again! "A friend in need is a friend indeed, but a friend who bleeds is better." Rhedyn "Nevermore"

"Eagerly I wished the morrow; - vainly I had sought to borrow From my books surcease of sorrow - sorrow for the lost"......well me actually for today, i've been lost, hidden behind the pages of a new book. Each letter, pushing my mind into a whirlpool of thoughts, it would seem my only salvation. Confrontation seemed my downfall, i could not control either my pleasure or displeasure of talking to those who see face value (a mask) rather that the person who shows herself when they walk into the room. Very few people can actually see the real me....... you should know who you are, thanx for listening. While i hid behind "my books surcease of sorrow" i noticed something, there really are people who care for me. No matter how much i feel like their aren't, there's always someone there, sitting next to me, asking how i feel. Let this be the truth, sure there will always be days when i feel so alone and like the world is just too much for me, but you will be there, won't you, promise me this or i don't think the world would hold any value for me anymore. Rhedyn "Nevermore"

Creep (Acoustic) You float like a feather In a beautiful world I wish I was special You're so fucking special But I 'm a creep I 'm a weirdo What the hell am I doing here? I don't belong here I don't care if it hurts I want to have control I want a perfect body I want a perfect soul I want you to notice When I'm not around You're so fucking special I wish I was special But I'm a creep I'm a weirdo What the hell am I doing here? I don't belong here Whatever makes you happy Whatever you want You're so fucking special I wish I was special But I'm a creep I'm a weirdo What the hell am I doing here? I don't belong here I don't belong here. Rhedyn "Nevermore"

"Deep into the darkness peering, long I stood there, wondering, fearing Doubting, dreaming dreams no mortals ever dared to dream before;" I didn't sleep very well last night. I'm getting an extreemly nasty cold that both of my parents have had and so they said "hey, i've got an idea, lets get Jenni sick so she can be miserable". The sad thing is, i'm sure that they are going to make me go to school tomorrow, it's like they try and make me feel like crap. Parents suck Rhedyn "Nevermore"

forgive me blog god for i have posteded twice today. it's been 3 hours since my last post. I went back to my blog and looked at my last post and thought.... what the fuck was I on? oh well anyway. Jonathan and Jenny came over last night for movies. we watched secret window - very good the crow - very good Jonathan had to go home. damn parents not trusting me around guys.... or is it the other way around? but Jenny stayed. we talked for ages and i realised how much of a whiney bitch i've been over the last week... i hope it doesn't last Rhedyn "Nevermore"

One asks: Where did you go? One asks: Why did you leave? One says: I hope you never return! One asks: Why would I care? Where did you go? You went away .Ever since, my mind has been exploding with a unique jealousy, wondering in which mind you now take up shelter. Why did you leave? I needed you, but I never showed it, is this why you left me with the others? you were one I could always stand to have in my head, but I got bored of you easily It would seem. You helped me a lot with my unimportant crap, things that I thought I couldn't tell anyone, and I couldn't but you knew. I hope you never return! When you saw the fountain of youth you said you cared, and this would seem true but what of when my eyes were shut, were your thoughts always so comforting, this I have always doubted. You left when I thought we were the closest we'd ever been. You resented me, didn't you? Why would I care? You were part of me for a while, like my child. Letting you go was the most difficult decision I ever had to make, but it was for my sanity, for my well being and for those around me. I can't be the person you made me, forever. One says: I hate you too much One asks: will you be there for me ever again? One says: I miss you too much All the others just glare. ....confused? i hope so Rhedyn "Nevermore"

This is the worst week of my life. today i was told that i have to do my speech again and for those who know me, they know that i can't handle speeches, once a year is way to much. I told Mr Wilson that i just couldn't do it but he kept pushing me and i almost cried (again) but i held it in, i'm sure he could see this but all he did was say that if i didn't agree to do it he was going to call my parents and make them make me do it, but i heldthe tears in. After school, my mum was there to pick me up and the tears i had been holding in just ran down my cheek. I told her about having to do my speech again, and since she could see i was upset, she said that it didn't matter if Mr Wilson was going to call, she would just tell him that I have always had problems with speeches and she couldn't make me do it, if i didn't want to..... The worst week of my life 3 out of 3 days i've cried 2 out of 3 days i've let people see it 3 out of 3 days i've been depressed 1 out of 3 days i took Laura's "don't worry you'll die one day" speech seriously and smiled at the thought i hate feeling this way Rhedyn "Nevermore"

"Will you walk me, To the edge again? Shaking, lonely, and I am drinking again Woke up tonight and no one's here with me I'm giving in" I've had enough. I hate people so much that i can't stand it. All through Badminton there was atleast one tear rolling down my cheak, i had to show myself to erin and Jenny, i had to show myself being so very weak. What happened? people did, people who think they are sooo much better than me just because i'm different, just because i believe in different things, just because i questioned life, i questioned what most people around me take for granted. They got what they wanted, they made me feel like crap, they made me cry, they made me question where the nearest bridge is..... Rhedyn "Nevermore"

Something i was wondering on the way home today, If i was just like everyone else, would any of my favourite people notice me, talk to me...... i can't imagine they would, maybe that is why i strive to be different because i know that being like everyone else means being cast out by those who say they care about me. In class last term we talked about how those who don't conform get cast out, for me it is the opposite, if i were to conform i could kiss my 'friends' goodbye. I would be so very alone in this world, i would never get invited anywhere, never would i feel needed... hmmm sounds like my life now.... maybe it wouldn't be such a change after all, maybe for me conforming is just another choice that leads to the same outcome. Rhedyn "Nevermore"

I'm so bored of people. I feel like no one could really interest me right now, oh well, it's a good day for being alone anyway. Last night there was nothing to do at all, my head was screaming out for something to do or someone to talk to and today, I couldn't care less if no one talked to me..... no, i don't mean that, i just need an interesting conversation Rhedyn "Nevermore"

I got a Muse DVD today. It's great. I went to Cartwell afterschool and I went into sounds, and there is was, Muse: Hullabaloo: live at Le Zenith, Paris and it was only $30. so i thought, must have must have must have and bought it. Rhedyn "Nevermore"

This song (by APC for all you unknowing people) seems to show what i feel today. sorta floating on air, sorta detatched, sorta bored and sorta like i'm fading into the background. I don't even know why i feel like this, its not like anyone really ignored me today, maybe i just need alot of attention like a puppy.... hmm i don't like that...... dead puppy? i can't really imagine how much attention a dead puppy needs..... how about just an evil puppy.... hmmm.. something still doesn't fit..... i'm an evil puppy with fireball eyes.... and....and.... a wagging tail of doom... okay....maybe I need alot of attention like an evil puppy with fireball eyes and a wagging tail of doom. Rhedyn "Nevermore"

I've been listening to this song called 'Something more' and it makes so much sence to me. Do you know the feeling of finding a song or a phrase which completely convays what you think? "And I believe there's something more 'Cause this isn't what I've been looking for And if I blink my eyes I'm afraid I might miss some of it This makes no sense A mirage of an oasis And it kills my time" Alittle solumn maybe, but i always feel that way. Rhedyn "Nevermore"

This morning was...... different. I woke up with a smile on my face, for the time in ages. I even noticed a spring in my step when i walked to Chartwell, I seem to be happy, which is really odd since I have speeches tomorrow. Oh great now i feel sick, i hate speaking in public, i'm sure it will go away eventually, ow Rhedyn "Nevermore"
